name: Drift star
description:
So you think you are the real drift star?
Play the game and earn points by drifting.
The cars will go faster and faster after each curve so you need to be really quick and plan ahead.
Touch the screen to initiate the drift and release in good time to avoid crashing.

The game is 100% FREE FROM ADS and also NO IN APP PURCHASES

4 different cars to drive with different road assignments,
test them all to know which one suits you best.

The game is muted, no annoying music or anything else so you can play it
where ever and whenever you like without bothering anyone else.

Be the boss of drift in Drift star!
